content.rendered:
Hannah and Caleb celebrated their nuptials with a timeless wedding at The Bridge Building and a reception full of classic whites and touches of glam.

Hannah, who’s from New York, found Caleb, a Nashville native, on Instagram and took her shot through a direct message! The pair later met for dinner and the rest was history. 

Caleb proposed to Hannah the day after she moved to Nashville amid cardboard boxes and loads of excitement. For their wedding day, the most important part for them was simply to be wed. How sweet!

As for finding the right venue, Hannah said “everything just fell together perfectly,” and we’re so glad it did because we got to be a part of their special day! 

When July 9, 2021 arrived, Hannah and Caleb said “I do” with a downtown view from the wide windows of The Bridge Building’s main space and a wooden cross at the end of the altar. Hannah walked the aisle to her now husband in a stunning fit-and flare-gown with lace details, an all-white bouquet, and a Hollywood glam-inspired hairdo.

Following the ceremony, guests enjoyed delicious hors d'oeuvres of candied bacon, fried mac and cheese, mini chicken and waffles, and pepper jelly pimento cheese bruschetta, all whilethe Infinity team flipped the main space for dinner. 

The reception was set with classic white linens and chairs, all white florals, a glamorous chandelier from Nashville Lighting and Production, and a greenery wall with a custom LED sign! Each table had touches of glam in gold candle votives, vases, and chic acrylic table numbers.

As guests found their seats, they awaited a plated dinner service of honey balsamic chicken with confit fingerling potatoes and broccolini, bourbon glazed salmon with  grilled asparagus and  peppercorn melange risotto, and blackberry pork loin with buttermilk whipped potatoes and broccolini.

Hannah’s maid of honor kicked off the night with a sweet toast, and the crowd danced the night away with a take home donut from Donut Distillery. 

Keep scrolling to see more of Hannah and Caleb’s timeless summer wedding day.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: July 9th, 2021
Happy Couple: Hannah and Caleb
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 111
Colors: Black & White
Photographer: Teale Photography 
Florist: Larson Floral co.
Cake: Publix
Donuts: Donut Distillery
Dress: Adorn Nashville
Hair + Makeup: Kris Miller Artistry
Rentals: EventWorks
DJ: DJ Rio
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Production Design: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Kalyn | IH

excerpt.rendered: A timeless wedding ceremony and reception with glamorous details at The Bridge Building.
